00025     PseudoRotatedSequence::PseudoRotatedSequence(const bpp::Sequence* a) :
00026       RotatedSequence(a, 0)
00027       {
00028       }

00030     PseudoRotatedSequence::~PseudoRotatedSequence()
00031       {
00032       }
00033     unsigned int PseudoRotatedSequence::size() const
00034       {
00035         //Since this Sequence is metarotated return twice the size minus one
00036         return ((2* _content.size()));
00037       }
00038     int PseudoRotatedSequence::getValue(unsigned int pos) const
00039         throw (bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException)
00040       {
00041         pos = pos % _content.size();
00042         if (pos > this->size())
00043           throw bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException("SymbolList::getChar. Invalid position.", pos, 0, size() - 1);
00044         return _content[pos];
00045       }
00046 
00047     string PseudoRotatedSequence::getChar(unsigned int pos) const
00048         throw (bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException)
00049       {
00050 
00051         pos = pos % _content.size();
00052         if (pos > this->size())
00053           throw bpp::IndexOutOfBoundsException("SymbolList::getChar. Invalid position.", pos, 0, size() - 1);
00054         string c = "";
00055         try
00056           {
00057             c = _alphabet -> intToChar(_content[pos]);
00058           }
00059         catch(bpp::BadIntException bie)
00060           {
00061 
00062             //This should never happen!
00063           }
00064         return c;
00065       }
00066     const int & PseudoRotatedSequence::operator[](unsigned int i) const
00067       {
00068         i = i % _content.size();
00069         return _content[i];
00070       }
00071     int & PseudoRotatedSequence::operator[](unsigned int i)
00072       {
00073         i = i % _content.size();
00074         return _content[i];
00075       }
